properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_UNIONBOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_NAME, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
)
